entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
